pageContext.claim: “I was doing OK but not great with the African-American community. …  And sometimes I just say, ‘What do you have to lose?’ But it was always much more exciting when I say, ‘What the hell do you have to lose by going with me?’ And you know that increased my poll numbers incredibly with the African-American community to a point that was -- I mean, many times what I was getting.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has a very low approval rating among black voters and won 8 percent of their vote in 2016, according to network exit polls. His "what do you have to lose" comments did not appreciably increase his poll numbers among African Americans.
